data.message: Updated Duro roadmap v2 with structural upgrades: Added: deterministic wow demo, 10-min onboarding path, mini Compass Score earlier (Week 9-10), trust collapse as primary risk, better metrics (activation/retention/wow completion), Pro positioning as "power tools for memory hygiene".
